DOC.brief_summary: Nitrate provide body alternative source Nitric Oxide play large role promote blood flow reduce blood pressure . Nitrate supplementation vegetable/fruit juice recently show reduce blood pressure reduce energy expenditure low intensity exercise . Such finding combine previously know biological effect nitric oxide would suggest nitrate supplementation would also impact blood flow . The aim study examine effect dietary nitrate supplementation via vegetable/fruit juice drink cerebral ( brain ) blood flow ( use Near Infrared Spectroscopy ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Dietary Nitrate From Vegetable/Fruit Juice Cerebral Blood Flow Parameters
DOC.criteria: healthy young ( 1835 year ) male female adult , vulnerable . smoke consume tobacco product ( even occasionally ) proficient English pregnant ( seek become ) currently take recreational , counter/prescription medication ( exclude contraceptive pill ) , and/or dietary/herbal supplement . food allergy sensitivities relevant study history of/current head trauma , learn difficulty , ADHD , dyslexia , migraine gastric problem .
